description: Pull S3 zip, extract, and run Ansible playbook on Windows

S3BucketName.description: The name of the S3 bucket

S3Key.description: The key of the zip file in the S3 bucket

DestinationPath.description: The path to save the zip file and extract contents

ZipFileName.description: The name of the zip file

ZipFileExtracted.description: The name of the extracted file
